# Return values for modal operations

**API Collection**

Historical return values for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModal(for:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)].

## Overview

The system also reserves all values below these.

## Constants

- **NSRunAbortedResponse**: Modal session was broken with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/abortModal()].
- **NSRunContinuesResponse**: Modal session is continuing (returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)] only).
- **NSRunStoppedResponse**: Modal session was broken with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/stopModal()].

## Enumerations

- **NSMultibyteGlyphPacking**: A constant for glyph packing.
- **Glyph Attributes**: Attributes that are used only inside the glyph generation machinery, but must also be shared between components.
- **NSOpenGLGlobalOption**: Constants that specify OpenGL options.
- **Data Entry Types**: These constants specify how a cell formats numeric data.
- **Anonymous**
- **Additional Writing Directions**: Constants that specify additional options when setting the writing direction of attributed strings.
- **Tags of Views in the FontPanel**: These constants are obsolete and should not be used.
